Function Documentation

int comedi_sys_attach (  int  fd,
comedi_lnkdesc_t *  arg
) 
 

Attach a Comedi device to a driver.

Parameters:
[in] fd File descriptor as returned by comedi_sys_open()
[in] arg Link descriptor argument
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise a negative error code.
